scripts.build:all: npm run build --prefix packages/calculated-metric-backoffice && npm run build --prefix packages/custom-channel-permission-backoffice && npm run build --prefix packages/custom-deduplication-backoffice && npm run build --prefix packages/event-usage-report && npm run build --prefix packages/reactivated-attribution-redesign
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix packages/calculated-metric-backoffice && npm install --prefix packages/custom-channel-permission-backoffice && npm install --prefix packages/custom-deduplication-backoffice && npm install --prefix packages/event-usage-report && npm install --prefix packages/reactivated-attribution-redesign
